info.title: Race
info.description: This schema represents a Runner who runs Runs and has the potential of winning Races..It fixes datatypes and keys from version 0.0.1 and also incorporates a link to an external hierarchy (LDBC sports ontology)

id.description: A unique identifier for a race.

raceCategory.description: A reference to an external taxonomy of race types.

comprisedOfRuns.description: An array of Runs that comprise the race.

wonByRunner.description: The (single) winner of the race.  (rule) Should match the run of shortest duration.

courseLength.description: Length of the course in a scalar unit (decimal miles)

id.description: A unique iri for the run.

date.description: The date on which the run occurred.

distance.description: The distance covered, in a scalar value.

distanceLabel.description: The distance covered, in a conventional notation.

duration.description: The duration of the run.  Optional because in some circumstances a run is not 'finished'

id.description: A unique IRI for a runner. Can be used to dedupe instances of runners.

name.description: The name of the runner.  In this early model, unique and a PK.

gender.description: The gender of the runner (for the purposes of race categories.)
